title: 3-hour plus power outages for 13th & 14th May
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board states that the scheduled power cuts will take place for 3 hours and 20 minutes tomorrow (13) and the day after (14), due to the lack of sufficient fuel and water to generate electricity.
According to the CEB, power cuts will be imposed in areas A to W from 9.00 am to 5.00 pm for 2 hours and from 5.00 pm to 9.00 pm for one hour and 20 minutes.
Ranil’s appointment to the post of Prime Minister cannot be accepted – Cardinal
Ranil Wickremesinghe is the savior of the Rajapaksa’s – Anura Kumara
